title: How to Draw 1-12 Collection (gnv64)
description:
How to Draw Collection 1-12 (Over 400 Pages) (How to Draw Collections)
By Amit Offir
Troubadour | June 2013 | ePUB | 15.8 mb

All of the books in this drawing collection of the the well known Amit Offir author and illustrator are or were BEST SELLERS on amazon.
First collection 1-12 has been #1 in "Activity Books" category on amazon!
It is a great drawing book for parents who want to draw with their kids.
Drawing teachers and art teachers can use it in so many ways to teach drawing for kids and of course for kids and adults who love to draw and want to improve their drawing skills
The drawings are really easy to follow and very easy to draw!
so if you want to know how to draw animals, how to draw dragons, how to draw cartoon, how to draw manga drawings, how to draw cars and other vehicles and much more this is the perfect collection book for you
There are lots of drawing books that teach how to draw comics, but with these drawing lessons you will draw and succeed in no time!
These are not only drawing for kids! anyone can learn how to draw with this book! in every page you will learn step by step drawings that will make drawing easier for you even if you dont know how to draw!

In this collection you will learn how to draw:
* how to draw pirates
* how to draw wild animals
* how to draw vehicles
* how to draw fantasy
* how to draw fashion world
* how to draw prehistoric world
* how to draw the farm
* how to draw the garden and much more!
